thread.title: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show
thread.title_full: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show

title: Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show
text:
> Entertainment Grateful Dead, John Mayer giving away 10K tickets to NY show FILE - In this Feb. 8, 2015, file photo, John Mayer arrives at the 57th annual Grammy Awards at the Staples Center in Los Angeles. Members of the Grateful Dead and Mayer are giving 10,000 free tickets to their concert next month. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
